Mistakes are amazing. Make loads of them so long as you learn from them. Otherwise, you're an idiot! #startups #2016Lessons
I've made more mistakes in the last 6 months since I launched @ItsPintAid then I did in my previous 12years . #2016lessons #startups
Always check your tweets before sending them. Predictive text is a cruel mistress! #startups #2016lessons
don't buy shines new shit when you've no customers.Lota of 2nd hand equipment and free online resources out there. #2016Lessons #startups
Never lose your passion and energy. That is unique to you and no one can replicate it #startups #2016lessons
Review everything. Especially event budgets and marketing costs. You can always do it cheaper. #startups #2016Lessons
Imitation is the best form of flattery. Engage with competitors and imitators. Own your space . #startups #2016Lessons
Everyone has an opinion on how you should run your startup. Accept their advice and be thankful for their interest. #startups #2016lessons
